The CDA audio tracks converted to MP3 can be found at http://gh.ffshrine.org/soundtracks/751

Name track 101 to track1.mp3 and 201 to track2.mp3, and add them to your t7g directory. Assuming you are using SCUMMVM (as you should be), the game plays flawlessly with full music on any SCUMMVM compatible platform.
